abstract: Deadlocked Manhattan jury in murder trial of Pedro Hernandez, accused of killing Etan Patz in 1979, listens to reading of defense summation again before resuming deliberations.
lead_paragraph: The Manhattan jurors deciding the fate of a man accused of killing Etan in 1979 revisited the defense summation before resuming their deliberations, a day after the panel announced it was deadlocked.

headline.main: Jury in Etan Patz Trial Rehears Defense Summation on Day 12 of Deliberating
headline.print_headline: Patz Jury Rehears Defense Summation on Day 12 of Deliberating

snippet: The Manhattan jurors deciding the fate of a man accused of killing Etan in 1979 revisited the defense summation before resuming their deliberations, a day after the panel announced it was deadlocked.
